name: ntacloud
description: An open-source & self-hostable Heroku / Netlify alternative.

scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yaml up -d && cross-env NODE_ENV=development & svelte-kit dev
scripts.start: npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db seed && node build/index.js
scripts.release:production:all: cross-var docker build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t netka/ntacloud:$npm_package_version -t netka/ntacloud:latest --push .
scripts.release:production:amd: cross-var docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t netka/ntacloud:$npm_package_version -t netka/ntacloud:latest --push .
scripts.release:haproxy: docker build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t netka/ntacloud-haproxy-alpine:latest -t netka/ntacloud-haproxy-alpine:1.1.0 -f data/haproxy.Dockerfile --push .
scripts.release:haproxy:tcp: docker build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t netka/ntacloud-haproxy-tcp-alpine:latest -t netka/ntacloud-haproxy-tcp-alpine:1.1.0 -f data/haproxy-tcp.Dockerfile --push .
scripts.release:haproxy:http: docker build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t netka/ntacloud-haproxy-http-alpine:latest -t netka/ntacloud-haproxy-http-alpine:1.1.0 -f data/haproxy-http.Dockerfile --push .
